    • Method Detail

      • getfieldNamesuffix

        public java.lang.String getfieldNamesuffix(int index)
        Returns the id of the subject for the given Index. It is used by the question block class to get the Id of the subject which meets the precondition
        Parameters:
        index - The Index whose subject ID is needed.
        Returns:
        String The subject ID.
